Summary: Naruto Uzumaki joins Team 7, which is sent on a mission to the Land of Waves.
Team 7 participates in the Chūnin Exams, where they compete against former classmates and new rivals.
The village of Konohagakure is invaded by Orochimaru and his allies.
Naruto helps Jiraiya track down Tsunade to ask her to become Konoha's new Hokage.
Team 7 goes to the Land of Tea to help Idate Morino win a race.
Naruto tries to stop his friend, Sasuke Uchiha, from defecting to Orochimaru.

Arc Name: Land of Rice Fields Investigation Mission
Summary: Jiraiya takes Naruto and Sakura to investigate Orochimaru's whereabouts in the Land of Rice Fields.
Naruto helps capture the escaped convict, Mizuki.
Naruto and Team 8 look for the bikōchū beetle in the hopes that it can be used to find Sasuke.
Naruto and Team Guy deal with Raiga Kurosuki and his Kurosuki family.
Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata help Sazanami clear his name.
Naruto, Neji, and Tenten go to the Land of Birds to deal with a mysterious ghost.
Anko Mitarashi takes Naruto, Ino, and Shino to the Land of the Sea to find information on Orochimaru.
Naruto is again paired up with Kiba and Hinata in order to improve their teamwork.
Naruto and Team Guy go to Hoshigakure to help the villagers protect their sacred star.
Naruto, Hinata, and Chōji go to the Land of Vegetables to protect some peddlers from the Janin.
Guy is forced to deal with Yagura's apparent attempts at revenge.
Naruto and his friends stop Gennō from destroying Konoha.
Kurenai temporarily leaves Team 8 to take care of some old business with Yakumo Kurama.
Naruto, Sakura, and Lee help transfer a member of the Shinobazu to prison.
Naruto helps Menma regain his memory.
Konoha sends a team to Sunagakure to help rescue Matsuri from the Four Celestial Symbols Men.
